name: Amunets Server Transfer - v1.0.34
description:
[b]Mod-ID[/b]: 2305969565

A server cluster solution for conan.
This mod allows switching "on the fly" between servers (in multiplayer) and maps (in singleplayer) while taking your character with you.

Discord @ https://discord.gg/a8hGAKW
Patreon @ https://www.patreon.com/sailorsat

For MS-Store users - read [url=https://forums.funcom.com/t/for-ms-store-how-to-get-mods-off-the-steam-workshop-without-a-steam-account/174325]this[/url].
author: LilMissHentai
